squirm.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to twist your body from side to side because you are uncomfortable or nervous, or to get free from something which is holding you
squirm.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Christine squirmed uncomfortably in her chair.
The boy tried to squirm free.
squirm.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to feel very embarrassed or ashamed
squirm.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He made me squirm with embarrassment.
